title: Ticket #7515: Manual not display ipython3 source code correctly
description:
It looks like the ipython3 code snippets in the manual aren't showing up correctly. See here:

https://htcondor.readthedocs.io/en/latest/apis/python-bindings/intro_tutorials/job_management.html

From looking at the docs source, we should be seeing some code examples here. Hopefully it's just a simple extension import error or something similar.
remarks:

2020-Feb-20 13:39:40 by karpel:
So, it looks like this is basically happening because of crossed wires between TimT and me. #7141 was supposed to be merged, which would switch the tutorials to .ipynb files instead of .rst files and add the required packages for them to render. That branch was briefly merged, then got reverted, and then the tutorial files got stomped entirely in the 8.9.4 final build (sha 73ab35e13671824493416a8754ad762a23f7ab91). 8.9.4 and 8.9.5 docs are both broken in the same way.

TimT and I will fix this tomorrow morning by merging #7141 and making sure the docs build correctly.

2020-Feb-24 12:12:19 by karpel:
The two broken published manuals (8.9.4 and 8.9.5) are now fixed. There is some follow-up work in #7518 before we can merge into master.
creator: coatsworth
